nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels Story and Activity Book

Star Wars Rebels Story and Activity Book is a activity from Egmont in the Star Wars Rebels series that includes puzzles, mazes, quizzes, posters, and games. It also includes the young readers short story Chopper Saves the Day, which was adapted by Elizabeth Schaefer from the Star Wars Rebels short "The Machine in the Ghost." It was released on October 9, 2014.

Read, colour and play with your favourite characters from Star Wars Rebels in this epic story and activity book. Join Ezra, Kanan and the rest of the Ghost's crew in their latest anti-Empire adventure, complete the activities and join the Rebel cause. Featuring mazes, puzzles, colouring pages and an original Star Wars Rebels tale.
